recommendations.title: Optimize Tax-Deferred Contributions
recommendations.body: Consider maximizing contributions to tax-advantaged retirement accounts to reduce current tax liability and enhance long-term growth potential.

recommendations.title: Diversify Investment Portfolio
recommendations.body: Review asset allocation to ensure appropriate diversification across asset classes, geographies, and sectors to mitigate concentration risk.

recommendations.title: Review Insurance Coverage
recommendations.body: Evaluate current insurance policies including life, disability, and long-term care to ensure adequate protection for retirement years.

recommendations.title: Consider Inflation Hedges
recommendations.body: Incorporate inflation-protected securities or real assets to preserve purchasing power during retirement.
